en.content: just imagine, it was moby, so I went to say hello to him, and he told me would you give me a hand with my decks, so I went, and when we finished he gave me a T - shirt and a gold pass to see the concert from the first row, oh my god Kim that the best thing that ever happened to me, well Kim I hope to recieve a letter from you soon, and please tell everybody about the moby concert and everything, thank you.
en.label: incorrect
en.processed: Just imagine, it was Moby! So I went to say hello to him, and he asked if I could help him with his decks. Well, Kim, I hope to receive a letter from you soon, and please tell everyone about the Moby concert and everything. Thank you.

en.content: Well here in Dublin things still the same, but I think somebody told you that I went to the moby concert here at the point wich is the big theatre for events and concerts, I guess it was the best concert I've ever been to, but the coolest thing is that, well do you remember my friend Luke, the one that works as a security guard, well he told me that they needed people to put everything on the stage, so I went to help them and everithing else, and when I get into the point, do you who was there?
en.label: incorrect
en.processed: Here in Dublin, things are still the same. Someone told you I went to see the Moby concert at The Point, which is the main theater for events and concerts. It was probably the best concert I‚Äôve ever been to!  The coolest part is that, do you remember my friend Luke, the one who works as a security guard? He said they needed people to set up everything on stage, so I helped out. When I got to The Point, did you know who was there?
